short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that shows randomly selected verses from the noble Quran

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that displays randomly selected verses from the noble Quran at random times, in Arabic language or English, along side other options and features.
